alert.note: Alert for Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lumpkin, southeastern Gilmer, northwestern Dawson and southeastern Fannin Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Nimblewill, or 8 miles north of Dawsonville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amicalola Falls State Park, Springer Mountain Shelter, Len Foote Hike Inn, Camp Merrill, Black Gap Shelter, Stover Creek Shelter, Nimblewill, Juno, McKee and Gooch Mountain Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
